PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-05552010-04-29,  ,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActNorthwest Territories Act
SubjectBorrowing Limit - Northwest Territories
PrecisOrder (a) revoking Order in Council P.C. 2007-0378 of March 22, 2007; (b) temporarily increasing the borrowing limit for territorial, municipal or local purposes of the Commissioner of the Northwest Territories, on behalf of the territorial government, to $575 million during the period beginning as of the date of the making of the Order and ending March 31, 2015, and a return to the existing $500 million limit on or after April 1, 2015.
AttachmentsAttachment
